Our 4,500-square-foot restaurant with private party rooms features indoor and outdoor options. Want to have a cozy celebration dinner with close family? No problem. Fancy an after-wedding reception for 120 people in trendy Tampa or downtown St. Petersburg, FL? We can handle that. Looking for fun group outing ideas for your team? That‚Äôs our specialty. Why host an event anywhere else? Make LALA¬†your go-to place for all your formal and informal gatherings. Contact our team to make your reservation! Contact Us Event Spaces Variety is the spice of life. It‚Äôs also on display at LALA when you need a space to rent. Our small-party venues in Tampa and St. Pete are the perfect place to hold your next event. Find the right event venue at our thoughtfully designed fine dining restaurant and entertainment center: Private party rooms: Reserve one private room or several for your next get-together. Each private room is uniquely themed and outfitted with everything you need for karaoke. Bar area: Want to rent our rooftop bar? You‚Äôll get four rooms plus the bar area. If you‚Äôd like, choose just the bar area. Main restaurant: Looking for a Tampa Bay restaurant for private events? No problem! Just let us know your preferred event dates and times you would like the restaurant and bar for yourself. Custom spaces: Have the need for a special type of event area? Call us to discuss your goals. We‚Äôre happy to individualize your space rentals. Our Restaurant View Our Menu Private Karaoke Rooms Book Now Ready To Eat? Reserve a Table Party Venues Near You Choose LALA with its private rooms, restaurant, and bar for all types of festivities and outings: Bachelor and bachelorette parties : Turn on the fun at your next bachelor or bachelorette party. Kick back with fellow partygoers, enjoy our fantastic food and drinks, and sing your favorite tunes using our equipment. After karaoke in your private party room, head to our Activity Garden at our St. Pete location for some fun games, fantastic brews on tap, and more excitement. Birthday parties : When you‚Äôre ready to host a birthday party, look no further than LALA. Whether you‚Äôre looking for large or small party venues, we‚Äôve arranged our restaurant to be a haven for any type of birthday fun. Rent out one of our seven themed karaoke rooms or set aside the whole bar area for a big milestone birthday experience. Date night and nightlife events : Add some pizzazz to your date night by renting a private party room just for two, or for several couples. Belt out classic songs in a lively atmosphere and order Mediterranean-inspired food from our menu. Be sure to check out our lineup of full bar options! Family fun : It can be tough to find family-friendly restaurants with private party rooms and fine dining options. LALA caters to patrons who want to host gatherings of friends and family without giving up the option of eating sophisticated must-try dishes. Graduation parties: It‚Äôs time to relax and celebrate! Reserve a private party room or rent the whole restaurant. What could be a better way to celebrate your graduate‚Äôs achievements than with a night of singing and laughing? Corporate events : Business meetings just turned the corner from dull to delightful. When you host your next team-building session, client meeting, or product launch at LALA, everyone will remember it for all the right reasons. Our private rooms are ideally suited to getting work done ‚Äî and playing a little too. Discover LALA‚Äôs restaurant experience. LALA offers a new way to spend the day or evening. Featuring ready-to-rent private karaoke rooms, world-class public dining areas, our rooftop bar and an elevated approached of American, Mediterranean cuisine. Enjoy the family-friendly Activity Garden we share with Grand Central Brewhouse. LALA is destined to become your favorite hotspot. Swing by LALA tonight, book online or call to reserve a table or a karaoke room. Our Menu At LALA, our extensive menu ranges from American cuisine and pub favorites to sophisticated Mediterranean-inspired and French-influenced fares. Our chefs prepare all our dishes in house upon order using only the highest quality and freshest ingredients. Our wide variety allows you to explore seasonal tastes and everyday winners from the brunch, lunch or dinner menu. We also offer late-night food in St. Pete & Tampa. Don‚Äôt forget to try a signature cocktail, a glass of champagne, wine or beer from our extensive bars. Ready to Eat, Drink and Sing in our private karaoke rooms ? We‚Äôre happy to serve up our full menu for everyone in your group. Private Events When you want to host a private event, trust LALA to do it right. Experience our customizable private events tailored to your budget and group size. Choose between our rooftop bar area or our patio, which offers direct access to the downstairs bar. Elevate the excitement by bundling your reservation with one or more karaoke rooms for added fun. It‚Äôs the ideal entertainment to delight your guests and ensure your event is unforgettable! Email contact@lalastpete.com for our St. Pete location or contact@lalatampa.com for our Tampa location. LALA is the perfect space for Birthday Party, Bachelor/Bachelorette Party, Team Building, Corporate Event, Rehearsal Dinner, Wedding‚Ä¶. Whatever your vision for the perfect private event in St. Petersburg, we have the room and the desire to help you bring it to life. Karaoke Rooms in Tampa & St. Petersburg, FL LALA offers 15 private, themed karaoke rooms where you can EAT, DRINK & SING in a high-end private, affordable luxury experience for all types of groups. Each room can¬†accommodate different size groups, and we offer¬†several food & drink packages. Find the perfect way for you to show off your mad karaoke skills without going in front of strangers. Call to make a karaoke room reservation and ask about our¬†food & drink packages. Or just pop in to see if we have a karaoke box available. Book Now Our Unique Restaurant View Food  Menu Private Karaoke Rooms Book Now Ready To Eat? Reserve Your Table Awards The LALA Concept LALA is a unique entertainment restaurant and bar concept with both indoor and outdoor seating and features 15 private karaoke rooms with a system of over 70,000 songs. We are the first to offer a full dining experience in our private karaoke rooms. At LALA, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to enjoy moments with your friends, family, and work teammates. But did you know you can rent out family-friendly private karaoke rooms to play and sing among friends, not strangers? LALA is bringing the unique entertainment concept of these private karaoke rooms, also called ‚Äúkaraoke boxes‚Äù. We offer seven private karaoke room rentals near you, each with its own distinct style and theme. Our setup allows you to pick your stage and avoid the crowds for Saturday night karaoke. Just rent the room you like best, bring your buddies, colleagues, or family, and have a blast! EAT, DRINK & SING at LALA! When you want to spend the day or evening singing karaoke in the most fun, discreet way possible, think LALA! Make a reservation for karaoke and dinner or just walk in and see what we have for you. We value your feedback. Please leave us a review. Thank you! leave us a review Private Karaoke Rooms Near You When you‚Äôre looking for a private karaoke bar downtown in the Tampa Bay area, trust to deliver. Each of our seven private karaoke rooms has been appointed with a particular design and given a special name. The rooms are available in several layouts to accommodate a variety of group sizes. They‚Äôre ideal if you want to host a karaoke team-building event , bachelor or bachelorette party, or birthday party . Try a creative double-date night or couples‚Äô night at our restaurant with private karaoke rooms! Check out a tour of our karaoke rooms near you in this new video from Taste and See Tampa Bay! Of course, LALA offers more than private karaoke. Check out our other amazing amenities while you‚Äôre here, including our incredible restaurant, memorable bars, and open-air Activity Garden. The Restaurant at LALA To satisfy your appetite before or after your private room karaoke adventure, be sure to pop into our restaurant. We feature fare inspired by Mediterranean and European cuisine and married to American concepts. From traditional pub favorites to gourmet dishes, you get a little bit of everything at LALA‚Äôs restaurant. Our Restaurant View our Menu Private Karaoke Rooms Book Now Ready To Eat? Reserve a Table The Bars at LALA LALA St. Pete offers two full-service bars , The Club and The Rooftop. Both serve up signature cocktails, fine wines, tasty on-tap lineups from the Grand Central Brewhouse next door, mixed drinks, liquors and champagne. Whatever you need to wet your whistle, you‚Äôll find at our bars. LALA Tampa‚Äôs bar is half indoors and half outdoors, giving you the option to enjoy drinks in the vibrant outdoor patio or the comfortable indoor space. Whether you prefer fresh air or a more intimate setting, the choice is yours. Remember that you can always take your drink back to your private karaoke room with you, or have drinks brought to you while you‚Äôre picking out your next song selection. View Our Menu book Your Room The Activity Garden at LALA The excitement doesn‚Äôt stop with private karaoke boxes, a restaurant, and bars. We also serve up a patio Activity Garden at our St. Petersburg restaurant, offering outdoor seating and lots of fun things to do. After you‚Äôve wowed your crowd in a private karaoke room, hang out in the Activity Garden and try your hand at boules, a fun French lawn game. Make your karaoke room reservation today and see why everyone‚Äôs falling head over heels for the concept of private karaoke rooms! We‚Äôve got eight fantastic private karaoke rooms in Tampa for parties of various sizes, each with a special theme to amp up your night. Plus, we simplify your event planning by providing everything you could need, including food, drinks and other activities. You can EAT, DRINK & SING at LALA! Karaoke Party Planning Made Simple We understand the effort that goes into making group gatherings a success. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve designed LALA as a one-stop entertainment and event venue you can use for karaoke parties. Elements that make our karaoke bookings perfect for your Tampa night out include: Unique and Private Karaoke Rooms Our eight karaoke rooms each have themed designs that can inspire your get-together, including: Nashville, which holds up to 10 people. Gatsby, for up to 12 people. Reggae, holding up to six people. Studio 54, which holds 14 people. Backstage, which holds eight people. Hip-Hop, accommodating up to eight. Red Carpet, holding up to 12. Moulin Rouge, which accommodates 25. You can book one intimate space or multiple rooms for your guests to enjoy. The space you reserve is only for your party so that you can belt out your favorites to your heart‚Äôs content. Accessible Bookings Did you forget to book a karaoke room, or are you throwing together a last-minute, on-the-day affair? Worry not! We accept walk-ins and can fit your party into an available room or check the schedule for empty slots. While you wait, you can enjoy a drink at our covered patio. Food and Drinks Specials and Promotions Speaking of drinks, we‚Äôre in the popular SoHo area, the perfect place to grab a drink and enjoy your night. Make an experience of your night in this upscale area with our regular specials . Add delicious drinks and food to your karaoke booking with our 20% to 50% off promotions. With great discounts, you can have a fantastic karaoke night complete with fine dining and great drinks without breaking the bank! EAT, DRINK & SING at LALA Tampa At LALA, we‚Äôve designed our services so you can have a memorable time. We invest our best into all aspects of our service, including: Our Bar Singing can get you parched! Order drinks before, after and during your karaoke session. We have a full bar with indoor and outdoor seating. You can enjoy quality liquors, wine, champagne, mixed drinks, craft cocktails, beers, non-alcoholic drinks and more at a cozy indoor table or our covered patio. Book your karaoke room on Tuesday or Wednesday, and you can get a discount on drinks. Or, come in on Friday for our lively happy hours! A Quality Menu LALA serves quality, delicious food for diverse tastes. Our Tampa restaurant combines American and French dining, with Mediterranean influences evident in meals like our pan-seared red snapper. We make our dishes fresh and from scratch, using premium ingredients for authentic flavors and tastes. Bite into an elevated pub dish after karaoke, sit down for a gourmet meal or nibble on treats like our charcuterie boards ‚Äî there‚Äôs an option for everyone. Outdoor Experiences Relax and unwind on our beautiful patio, where you can savor delicious food and sip on a refreshing cocktail in a laid-back atmosphere. Book Your Next Successful Event at LALA Visit our Tampa bar, restaurant and karaoke venue ‚Äî an all-in-one location for the best times! We enjoy creating a space where people can make unforgettable memories and aim to offer activities and amenities that make that possible. Book your themed karaoke room or a table at our restaurant to enjoy your group gathering with us. You can also learn more about custom rentals of our bar and other areas. LALA offers plenty of options to motivate your group in unique, entertaining, and delicious ways. From our private event and karaoke rooms to our world-class restaurant starring fare with a flair, LALA promises the right ambiance to complement your indoor or outdoor team-building activities and goals. Call (727) 803-6519 for LALA St. Pete or (813) 250-9245 for LALA Tampa. You can also email us at contact@lalastpete.com or contact@lalatampa.com. Your Destination for Team Building We designed the LALA layout to offer a little bit of everything ‚Äî that‚Äôs what makes it perfect for any corporate team-building escape. Choose any of our comfortable spaces as the launching pad for your team-building activities. At LALA, team building doesn‚Äôt have to end when the workday‚Äôs over. Interested in arranging a laid-back adventure for your teammates? In need of the ideal restaurant for a sophisticated corporate dinner? Call our event planning staff now to design your perfect team-building day or evening. Private Rooms for Corporate Retreats Never underestimate the power of spending a corporate retreat off-site. Employees feel less constrained when they‚Äôre in a casual yet upscale atmosphere. Our private karaoke rooms have been designed for maximum convenience, and they‚Äôre all equipped with the technology you need to introduce karaoke into your team-building agenda. Karaoke remains one of the best ways to loosen people up and allow them to come out of their shells. Belting out tunes can be a terrific icebreaker activity ‚Äî you‚Äôll never feel the same way about your introverted finance director after hearing her tackle an Ariana Grande classic. book now Our Restaurant View Our Menu Private Karaoke Rooms Book Now Ready To Eat? Whether you‚Äôre wowing clients, honoring a retiring colleague, or celebrating the holidays with a team-building dinner, make LALA your go-to restaurant. The patio at our St. Petersburg location presents a welcome opportunity for everyone to grab a craft cocktail or on-tap ale. In the outdoor Activity Garden , your team will find tons of activities suitable for sparking conversations. From traditional French boules to¬†cornhole our outdoor games always impress. Make your next corporate party or team bonding session an event everyone will remember. St. Pete Gems: LALA is a Grand Central star for karaoke, cocktails and great eats We use cookies to give you the best experience on our site. Learn more or close to accept. √ó Skip to content Stories Guides Events Visitors Tours Merch Stories Guides Events Visitors Tours Merch Search Search COMMUNITY PARTNER Do It , Eat/Drink St. Pete Gems: LALA is a Grand Central star for karaoke, cocktails and great eats March 27, 2025 ‚Ä¢ By Bob Carskadon March 27, 2025 ‚Ä¢ By Bob Carskadon 23 SHARES Facebook Twitter From date nights on the roof to birthday parties in a karaoke room, LALA has become a go-to in St. Pete for high-energy karaoke, craft cocktails, and fantastic American and French dining with Mediterranean influences. Since opening to great fanfare three years ago on the dot, LALA has established itself as a mainstay in St. Pete and a star in the Grand Central District. Located at 2324 Central Avenue, LALA is much more than a typical karaoke bar. In fact, the main bar and dining room only even have karaoke a few nights a week. The real sing-along fun takes place inside LALA‚Äôs seven private karaoke rooms, spread across the ground floor and second floor, offering themed experiences for parties as small as just a few or as big as 18 people. ADVERTISEMENT While enjoying karaoke, groups are able to order from the kitchen and bar menu, and we certainly recommend sticking around for more cocktails after the fun. For bachelor and bachelorette parties, corporate happy hours, birthday celebrations, or just a fun night out with friends, the private karaoke room experience is perfect for groups of any kind. LALA also hosts open mic nights in the dining room five days a week, for those brave enough to rock the microphone in front of a crowd. Open mic takes place on Wednesday and Thursday from 9 pm to close; Friday and Saturday from 10 pm to 1:30 am; and during Sunday Brunch from 1 pm to 4 pm. Stellar drinks and dining at LALA Meanwhile, the inspired food menu at LALA has become a bit of a cult sensation, for those in the know. LALA features a unique and upscale menu showcasing American and French dining, with Mediterranean influences. Dinner reservations are available here. The dinner menu offers an incredible selection, with appetizers like charred Spanish octopus and housemade meatballs; entrees such as filet mignon, baby back ribs, and duck linguini; and a sandwich menu that includes some of the best burgers we‚Äôve had anywhere. (LALA‚Äôs truffle aioli burger is rich, decadent, and packed with flavor in every bite.) No matter the time of the day or night, there is always excellent food available. LALA features different menus for lunch, dinner, brunch, late night, dessert, happy hour, and even kids. Don‚Äôt skip the LALA happy hour, either, offering fantastic specials Monday-Friday from 4-6 pm. Plus, on Tuesdays, guests get 20% off the entire bill and 50% off karaoke rooms. Then, on Wednesdays, everyone gets 50% off bottles of wine and champagne, as well as 50% off karaoke rooms. And the rooftop bar at LALA may very well be the best seat in town, a shaded and lively balcony overlooking Central Avenue as well as the beautiful courtyard. On that note, the shared courtyard with next-door neighbor Grand Central Brewhouse is one of the most enjoyable social spots every weekend, packed with people and events from Friday happy hour through the end of Sunday Funday. SoHo Tampa marks second LALA location While we love having LALA down the street, we can‚Äôt keep all the fun on our side of the bridge. After a lengthy search for the perfect location, LALA just opened its second location in Tampa‚Äôs SoHo neighborhood. The upscale karaoke bar and restaurant is officially open at 208 South Howard Avenue, bringing a star in St. Pete to the other side of the bridge. LALA Tampa features eight unique rooms that can fit up to as many as 25 people in the biggest ones, with themes such as Moulin Rouge, Gatsby, Nashville, Hip Hop and more. Rooms are already in high demand, so if you‚Äôre headed over for a night in Tampa, we also recommend securing reservations, which are available here , though walk-ins are welcome as the schedule allows. Beyond the karaoke, the covered outdoor patio is the jewel of LALA Tampa, and already it has become one of the most highly sought after seats in town, whether you‚Äôre in for a night of karaoke or just want drinks with a breeze. Having seen firsthand the excitement LALA brought to Central Avenue in St. Pete, we‚Äôre thrilled to see what they do in the lively SoHo neighborhood in Tampa. Learn more about LALA St. Pete here , and be sure to follow them on instagram for the latest events and news. Originally from Mississippi, he swapped catfish for grouper and now calls Florida home. LALA St. Pete - Grand Central Brewhouse Skip to content About Our Story Our Team Our Mission Code Of Conduct On Tap Our Beer Food LALA St. Pete Menu Community Brew good SUSTAINABILITY Visit TAPROOM BEER GARDEN STAMMTISCH TERRACE Events Private Events Book An Event Contact About Our Story Our Team Our Mission Code Of Conduct On Tap Our Beer Food LALA St. Pete Menu Community Brew good SUSTAINABILITY Visit TAPROOM BEER GARDEN STAMMTISCH TERRACE Events Private Events Book An Event Contact Facebook Instagram Brewery, Taproom and Beer Garden in St. Petersburg, FL LALA St. Pete LALA St. Pete is a new restaurant, bar, and karaoke box coming to the Grand Central District in 2021 and it‚Äôs just a short walk across our beer garden. Conceived by local restaurateur Lucas Herraiz, owner of Tikanis on Bay Pines Blvd., their menu will feature an elevated approach to American craft fare with French influences. The food will range from wings with house-made sauces and home made brick oven pizza to an assortment of appetizers, salads, handhelds, and entrees such beef bourguignon. A full menu of craft cocktails, wine, and GCB beer will also be available. In addition to a large general seating area that includes a rooftop bar and two outdoor terraces, LALA will have seven private karaoke rooms, or ‚Äúkaraoke boxes‚Äù. Ranging in size and theme, each room will have proprietary karaoke machines with a large catalogue of songs. In between your favorite ballads, you can order food and beverages to keep the party going. Grand Central Brewhouse patrons will also be able to order LALA food, enjoying the benefits of a brew pub within the casual atmosphere of our taproom and beer garden. The menu will feature recommended beer pairings for the optimal flavor experience and select dishes will be made with GCB brew. Learn more about the founder of LALA and all the restaurant offerings in this article by St. Pete Rising . return to news Join us on Sunday, September 7 at 5 PM when The Sundaes take the stage for a Sunday night set you won‚Äôt want to miss. If you could piece together a supergroup whose harmonies could stretch the weekend just a little longer, this would be it. Each member brings their own talent and energy, coming together to create a sound that feels equal parts timeless and feel-good. Come hang. 10 1 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 18020757095751390 10 1 Speak Easy returns to GCB On September 6th at 7PM with their signature blend of groove-heavy rhythm, catchy lyrics, and high-energy performance. Since forming at USFSP in 2017, they‚Äôve become a staple of the St. Pete music scene and have played stages across Florida including Gasparilla Music Fest, Clearwater Jazz Fest, and the Floridian Social Club. Expect electric guitar solos, tight harmonies, and a sound that‚Äôs sure to move a crowd. 14 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 18049245218298443 14 0 SkaFest Vol. 3 was an absolute blast. Thanks to everyone who came out to dance, drink, and make it another unforgettable day. Our SkaFest shirts went fast this year and we‚Äôre already down to fewer than 20 left. Mediums are sold out, but we still have a handful of Smalls, plus L, XL, and 2XL. If you missed grabbing one at the festival, now‚Äôs the time to stop by and pick one up before they‚Äôre gone. 46 3 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 18075631139018210 46 3 Pinellas Run Club meets tonight (September 4th) at 6 PM right here at the brewery. After a quick overview, runners and walkers head out for a their chosen distance route. After the run enjoy $2 off GCB beers. It‚Äôs one of the biggest run clubs in the area and always a great time. 27 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 17847367746556737 27 0 On Friday, September 5 at 6 PM Crisis the Jazz Project returns to GCB! If you haven‚Äôt heard of them before, they are a jazz project featuring members of well-known Tampa Bay bands stepping outside their usual sound. Blending their backgrounds into something unexpected, this group brings a fresh take on jazz with familiar faces in less familiar territory. Catch them live and see what happens when musicians push past the edges of their genre. 11 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 17999308943656733 11 0 Our latest collaboration with @pointybelbrew, Rice Rice Baby, is a clean and refreshing rice lager brewed with Riverbend Pilsner malt and jasmine rice. The rice lends a delicate floral aroma and a subtle sweetness that lightens the body while keeping the finish crisp and dry. Perle and Saaz hops add gentle spice and a touch of herbal character that complement the malt and rice without overpowering them. The result is a bright lager with notes of toasted baguette and fragrant jasmine blossom, culminating in a clean, refreshing close. At 4.5% ABV, this lager shows that true complexity can be found in simplicity. Rice Rice Baby is on tap now, and we`ll also be pouring it today, Sunday August 31, at the Cool & Crispy Festival at Point Ybel Brewing. Stop by and grab a glass! 33 2 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 18057786497113047 33 2 On Sunday, August 31 at 2 PM The Fernando Cruz Trio returns to Grand Central Brewhouse for an afternoon of rich, expressive jazz led by saxophonist, composer, and educator Fernando Cruz. A standout in the Florida music scene, Fernando brings a deep, soulful energy to the stage inspired by legends like Coltrane, Rollins, and Parker. Join us for a performance that blends technical mastery with heartfelt improvisation. 8 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 18491141893069259 8 0 Today‚Äôs the day! SkaFest Vol. 3: Lager‚Äôs Not Dead kicks off at 1 PM. We‚Äôve got seven bands lined up to keep the music rolling all day long, fresh lagers pouring nonstop, and some great vendors joining the party. Music starts at 1 PM and runs through the night. Grab your crew, lace up those dancing shoes, and get ready to skank the day away with us! 41 3 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 17917168335157232 41 3 SkaFest is back this Saturday! Lager‚Äôs Not Dead: SkaFest Vol. 3 hits Grand Central Brewhouse on Saturday, August 30 from 1 PM to 10 PM, and it‚Äôs shaping up to be one of the best yet. The lineup: üí• Eric Best ‚Äì 1 PM - 1:45PM üí• Over Wait Mammal ‚Äì 2 PM - 2:45 PM üí• Saganaki Bomb Squad ‚Äì 3 PM - 3:45 PM üí• Chilled Monkey Brains ‚Äì 4 PM - 5 PM üí• Floridaze ‚Äì 5:15 PM - 6:30 PM üí• Control This! ‚Äì 6:45 PM - 7:45 PM üí• Victims of Circumstance ‚Äì 8 PM - 9:45 PM We‚Äôll have a wide array of fresh lagers pouring all day, a misting tent to keep you cool, and vendors like JB‚Äôs Hot Dogs, Churned Ice Cream, and Planet Retro hanging out for the day. This event takes place in the Beer Garden and will be held rain or shine. We have plenty of tent coverage set up for the occasion. *Performance times are subject to change. See you at SkaFest! 38 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 17981312699736682 38 0 On Friday, August 29 at 6 PM Ultra Vinyl takes the stage with a set full of hits from across the decades. This Tampa Bay-based cover band brings a polished, high-energy performance that‚Äôs perfect for fans of live music you know and love. Whether you‚Äôre here to dance or just enjoy a great show with a beer in hand, Ultra Vinyl delivers the soundtrack. 5 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 18058524002105109 5 0 21 2 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 17853359745469320 21 2 On Saturday, August 23 at 6 PM The Rich Sheldon Band brings their blend of soulful Americana, folk, and roots rock to Grand Central Brewhouse. With influences ranging from the Grateful Dead and Bob Marley to Dylan and The Beatles, Rich and his band deliver a mix of original tunes, bluesy ballads, and jam-worthy covers that feel timeless. 7 0 Open post by grandcentralbrewhouse with ID 17975079755875857 7 0 Load More SIGN UP FOR THE BREWHOUSE BULLETIN Email Subscribe Address 2340 Central Ave. St. Petersburg, FL 33712 Hours Sun - Wed: 12pm - 10pm Thurs: 12pm - 11pm Fri - Sat: 12pm - 12am *After 9pm: 21 & Up Only GET IN TOUCH (727) 202-6071 [email¬†protected] Share your experience Facebook Instagram Yelp BLog Employee Portal ¬© Grand Central Brewhouse, St. Petersburg, FL | Privacy Policy | Powered & Designed by Brewing Sites Home About On Tap Our Beer Food Community Visit Events Private Events Contact Home About On Tap Our Beer Food Community Visit Events Private Events Contact Facebook Instagram

Reserve a Table The Restaurant: Enjoy a Date Night in Foodie Heaven Looking for an inspired menu that borrows from flavorful European cuisine? Our menu reflects a thoughtful marriage of traditional American fare mingled with French and Mediterranean tastes, cooking methods, ingredients, and mouthwatering recipes. Reserve a table The Bar: Taste Test Cocktails, Wine, Ales and More Your nightlife can be one-of-a-kind at LALA. From romance to laughter, we have everything you need to make your next outdoor or indoor date night more memorable. Reserve a room or table at LALA, or just stop by our restaurant for an impromptu date that‚Äôs sure to impress. Our venue provides exceptional food, private karaoke rooms and indoor and outdoor bars for an incredible all-around experience. We guarantee you‚Äôll love it! We Simplify Your Karaoke Night Planning! LALA karaoke spaces combine the ingredients of an excellent party spot. We provide convenient service that makes your planning easier with: Private Karaoke Rooms in St. Pete Our venue has seven karaoke rooms with unique designs to suit your get-together and accommodate everyone in your party. The stylish and relaxed Tropical room, our largest karaoke venue fitted for 18 people. A prohibition-esque Speakeasy room for up to 12 people. The Recording Studio, a sound-proof space designed like a music studio that holds eight people. Our superstars-only Grammys space for up to 10 singers. The stylish Glams room for up to five. Pre-book your desired room and ask our staff about our other services to complete your night. Walk-In Service We know not all great nights are preplanned, so we accept last-minute bookings, provided we have rooms available.
